p: So which pathogenetic elements underly higher susceptibility to COVID-19 disease and mortality rate in people with DM? The virus itself and its toxins precipitate a cytokine thunderstorm exacerbating hypercoagulation in patients with DM [20], [34] who, by definition, face a clear-cut prothrombotic state [35], further aggravated by chronic low-grade inflammation causing atherosclerosis-related endothelial dysfunction and insulin-resistance associated arterial hypertension [36]. All above-mentioned phenomena are known to become more and more severe as age increases and this is in line with the observation that octogenarian individuals are mostly affected by SARS-CoV-2 disease [19].
